# Ladybird data

``` {r}

ladybird <- read.csv('ladybirds.csv')
glimpse(ladybird)

```

Great, we're in the dataset. 
Let's break this down into industrial and Rural on a graph

```{r}

ggplot(ladybird, aes(x=Habitat, y=number, colour = colour))+
  geom_point(stat = "identity")+
  theme_classic()
  



```

Nice one tash !
